gen:link.msg:message: `BalanceIncomeAndExpenses` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Expenses` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Expenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Expenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncomeFromFundraising` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeFromFundraising')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeFromFundraising return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromFundraisingCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromFundraisingCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromFundraisingDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromFundraisingDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Income` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_Income')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_Income return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedStatementIncomeExpensesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
